review: Mathangi mam has been an pillar of support through out my pregnancy. she guided me right from day 1 for a normal delivery from weight reduction, control on gestational diabetes to proper regular monthly checkpoints. I had a normal delivery done by mam and I'm really so happy with her dedication and care shown on me and my baby. I highly recommend mam to all the mom to be's as she is super friendly , listens to all our problems and guides us throughout the journey to make it a happy and safe one..thank you mam ðŸ˜Š

**** ****** *** ****** *** *** ****** **** ** ********** ** i have pcod and am overweight. i was longing to be mom. i have visited many hospitals and doctors none explained me propery about pcod,pregnancy positive,weight reduction,intercourse dates.  none listened my problems calmly cz they are in rush to treat other patients. but mam listen your queries,problems and reply u and u ll understand it. u ll feel comfort and relax. with her hope u ll get all your energy to fight wit your issues and u ll really feel you ll b soon mom. womans who are all waiting for pregnancy waiting for right doctor visit mathangi mam.
I am very blessed to have both my girls delivered normally by mathangi mam. She is a very dedicated doctor.***** ****** * *** *******
